verses.verse: Thus all<WH3605> the work<WH4399> that Solomon<WH8010> made<WH6213> for the house<WH1004> of the LORD<WH3068> was finished:<WH7999> and Solomon<WH8010> brought<WH935> in all the things that David<WH1732> his father<WH25> had dedicated;<WH6944> and the silver,<WH3701> and the gold,<WH2091> and all<WH3605> the instruments,<WH3627> put<WH5414> he among the treasures<WH214> of the house<WH1004> of God.<WH430>

Then<WH227> Solomon<WH8010> assembled<WH6950> the elders<WH2205> of Israel,<WH3478> and all<WH3605> the heads<WH7218> of the tribes,<WH4294> the chief<WH5387> of the fathers<WH1> of the children<WH1121> of Israel,<WH3478> to Jerusalem,<WH3389> to bring<WH5927> up the ark<WH727> of the covenant<WH1285> of the LORD<WH3068> out of the city<WH5892> of David,<WH1732> which<WH1958> is Zion.<WH6726>
Why all<WH3605> the men<WH376> of Israel<WH3478> assembled<WH6950> themselves to the king<WH4428> in the feast<WH2282> which<WH1931> was in the seventh<WH7637> month.<WH2320>
And all<WH3605> the elders<WH2205> of Israel<WH3478> came;<WH935> and the Levites<WH3881> took<WH5375> up the ark.<WH727>

And they brought<WH5927> up the ark,<WH727> and the tabernacle<WH168> of the congregation,<WH4150> and all<WH3605> the holy<WH6944> vessels<WH3627> that were in the tabernacle,<WH168> these did the priests<WH3548> and the Levites<WH3881> bring<WH5927> up.

Also king<WH4428> Solomon,<WH8010> and all<WH3605> the congregation<WH5712> of Israel<WH3478> that were assembled<WH3259> to him before<WH6440> the ark,<WH727> sacrificed<WH2076> sheep<WH6629> and oxen,<WH1241> which<WH834> could not be told<WH5608> nor<WH3808> numbered<WH4487> for multitude.<WH7230>

And the priests<WH3548> brought<WH935> in the ark<WH727> of the covenant<WH1285> of the LORD<WH3068> to his place,<WH4725> to the oracle<WH1687> of the house,<WH1004> into<WH413> the most<WH6944> holy<WH6944> place, even under<WH8478> the wings<WH3671> of the cherubim:<WH3742>

For the cherubim<WH3742> spread<WH6566> forth their wings<WH3671> over<WH5921> the place<WH4725> of the ark,<WH727> and the cherubim<WH3742> covered<WH3680> the ark<WH727> and the staves<WH905> thereof above.<WH4605>

And they drew<WH748> out the staves<WH905> of the ark, that the ends<WH7218> of the staves<WH905> were seen<WH7200> from the ark<WH727> before<WH5921> <WH6440> the oracle;<WH1687> but they were not seen<WH7200> without.<WH2351> And there<WH8033> it is to this<WH2088> day.<WH3117>

There was nothing<WH369> in the ark<WH727> save<WH7535> the two<WH8147> tables<WH3871> which<WH834> Moses<WH4872> put<WH5414> therein at Horeb,<WH2722> when<WH834> the LORD<WH3068> made<WH3772> a covenant with the children<WH1121> of Israel,<WH3478> when they came<WH3318> out of Egypt.<WH4714>

And it came<WH1961> to pass, when the priests<WH3548> were come<WH3318> out of the holy<WH6944> place:<WH4725> (for all<WH3605> the priests<WH3548> that were present<WH4672> were sanctified,<WH6942> and did not then wait<WH8104> by course:<WH4256>

Also the Levites<WH3881> which were the singers,<WH7891> all<WH3605> of them of Asaph,<WH623> of Heman,<WH1968> of Jeduthun,<WH3038> with their sons<WH1121> and their brothers,<WH251> being arrayed<WH3847> in white linen,<WH948> having cymbals<WH4700> and psalteries<WH5035> and harps,<WH3658> stood<WH5975> at the east<WH4217> end of the altar,<WH4196> and with them an hundred<WH3967> and twenty<WH6242> priests<WH3548> sounding<WH2690> with trumpets:<WH2689>)

It came<WH1961> even to pass, as the trumpeters<WH2689> and singers<WH7891> were as one,<WH259> to make one<WH259> sound<WH6963> to be heard<WH8085> in praising<WH1984> and thanking<WH3034> the LORD;<WH3068> and when they lifted<WH7311> up their voice<WH6963> with the trumpets and cymbals<WH4700> and instruments<WH3627> of music,<WH7892> and praised<WH1984> the LORD,<WH3068> saying, For he is good;<WH2896> for his mercy<WH2617> endures for ever:<WH5769> that then the house<WH1004> was filled<WH4390> with a cloud,<WH6051> even the house<WH1004> of the LORD;<WH3068>

So that the priests<WH3548> could<WH3201> not stand<WH5975> to minister<WH8334> by reason<WH6440> of the cloud:<WH6051> for the glory<WH3519> of the LORD<WH3068> had filled<WH4390> the house<WH1004> of God.<WH430>
